column5: Does anyone know when/if the ice is off of Pakwash Lake Northwest of Ear Falls?If so, any fishing reports or info would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

I heard from Snake Falls Monday that the lake still had some ice but I'm guessing there can't be much - and it might be gone by now. Will be a late spring for sure but can't imagine it will be a problem for you. When/where are you going?

Picture of Pakwash from Pakwash Lake Camp south of the provincial Park area posted last Saturday (May 18th): Here Goes the Ice! Pakwash Lake is open. http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kW6kr52enE...0518-00259.jpg
Snake Falls? Are you referring to a certain transplant to Ear Falls?
Not sure about transplants, but Snake Falls Camp is on the north edge of Pakwash. Plenty of water coming into the lake from the Chukuni, so I suspect the ice clears out of there first..
